item.title: Some Julia language elements to keep in mind
item.description: As I am jumping on a project where I will code mainly in Julia, I thought it was worth spending some time to remind myself about core Julia’s features. I have already spent some reading reading Julia’s documentation which is great and definitively worth reading, but I was looking for something shorter and found ‘Julia language: a concise tutorial’ (Github repository available here), which by the way is listed in the Julia tutorials page.
